title: Hextech Key fragments don't drop for me anymore?
body: I know how they work the more you get the harder it is to get them and they refresh every month. But i don't thank mine refreshed. I'm not complaining just wondering if its a bug or something. cause i realized that i have had 2 key fragments for sooooo long now. maybe worth looking into.

replies.body: The drop rate resets roughly every 30 days after you get your first. There is also a current bug where you can't get key fragments when playing a champion you don't own.

DTN has provided some good information here.  To add, as noted in the [Hextech Crafting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide), obtaining fragments is more of a curve than a line so earning them can get slower.  Looking into this for you, I see that your account earned a considerable amount of fragment keys in June.  With a reset, you should see a similar rate as before.  If it feels like it's taking longer than you'd prefer, keys can also be obtained from the store.  Hope that helps!
